title: Hezbollah - linked Lebanon medics say Israeli strike wounds 16 children
message:
Smoke billows following an Israeli air strike on the south Lebanon town of Siddikine (KAWNAT HAJU)A Hezbollah-affiliated medical organisation said 16 children were wounded Saturday in an Israeli air strike on the south Lebanon town of Siddikine.
Aged between four and 14, the wounded children were taken for treatment in hospitals around the region, a source in the Islamic Health Committee told AFP.
Lebanon's state-run national News Agency said the strike on the town inland from the coastal city of Tyre was one of several conducted by Israel on Saturday.
The nearly eight months of violence have left almost 450 people dead in Lebanon, mostly fighters but including at least 80 civilians, according to an AFP tally.
On the Israeli side, at least 14 soldiers and 11 civilians have been killed, according to the army.

title: Fire at Vinnytsia infrastructure site caused by UAV wreckage
message:
A fire broke out at an energy facility in Vinnytsia OblastA fire erupted at a crucial infrastructure site in Vinnytsia Oblast due to fragments from a downed Russian UAV, Serhiy Borzov, the head of the Vinnytsia Oblast Administration, reported on the night of June 1.
The Ministry of Energy noted that five oblasts were targeted, significantly impacting Ukraine's energy infrastructure.
DTEK, a major Ukrainian energy company, reported substantial damage to two of its thermal power plants, marking this as the sixth significant attack on the power system since March 2024.
The attacks caused extensive damage to the power systems in regions including Vinnytsia, Kirovohrad, and Ivano-Frankivsk.
Additionally, Ivan Fedorov, head of the Zaporizhzhya Regional Administration, reported that an energy infrastructure facility in Zaporizhzhya was hit, resulting in traffic disruptions at the Dniprovska Hydro Power Plant.

title: Palestine man arrested , accused of stabbing victim with kitchen knife
message:
PALESTINE, Texas (KLTV) - A man has been arrested after a stabbing took place at a home in Palestine last Monday.
An officer was called to Palestine Regional Medical Center at about 2:20 a.m. after a stabbing was reported, according to a release from the Palestine Police Department.
The release said a victim at the hospital was suffering from numerous stab wounds.
He was still on scene, and officers arrested him without incident.
They also collected the kitchen knife used in the assault, the release said.
event_breakdown:
Stabbing in Palestine, Texas

The victim was suffering from numerous stab wounds and was still on scene. Officers arrested him without incident and confiscated the kitchen knife they believed was used in the assault.

title: Attack On Salman Khan Foiled : Cops Arrest 4 Lawrence Bishnoi Gang Members Who Planned 2nd Attack On Him In Panvel
message:
The Lawrence Bishnoi gang had planned an attack on Bollywood superstar Salman Khan's car in Panvel, more than a month after two accused fired shots outside his Bandra residence.
According to ANI, The Navi Mumbai Police arrested four members of the Lawrence Bishnoi gang who intended to attack Salman's car while he was en route to his Panvel farmhouse.
An FIR has been registered against more than 17 people including Lawrence Bishnoi, Anmol Bishnoi, Goldy Brar and further probe is underway.
On April 14, two bike-borne persons opened fire outside Salman's residence, Galaxy Apartment, in Bandra.
Security has been heightened outside Salman's residence along with the Y+ security that the actor has already been provided by the Maharashtra Police.

title: Hezbollah downs Israeli Hermes 900 UAV
message:
The Islamic Resistance in Lebanon shoots down an Israeli Hermes 900 drone over southern Lebanon.
Israeli Hermes 900 drone in freefall after it was intercepted by the Islamic Resistance in Lebanon - Hezbollah, in Deir Kifa, southern Lebanon, June 1, 2024.
(Social media)The Islamic Resistance in Lebanon - Hezbollah announced Saturday that it shot down an Israeli Hermes 900 drone over southern Lebanon.
The drone was shot down using a surface-to-air missile and it was later declared to have been a hostile Hermes 900 high-payload drone.
The Hermes 900 entered service with the Israeli Air Force in 2012 and was used during the Israeli occupation's war on the Gaza Strip in 2014.
event_breakdown: Islamic Resistance in Lebanon shoots down an Israeli Hermes 900 drone over southern Lebanon.

title: Jewish American World War II hero who was missing for 80 years is finally brought home after his remains were discovered in mass grave alongside Nazi soldiers
message:
The remains of a Jewish American World War II soldier have been brought back to the US 80 years after he went missing and was discovered in a mass grave alongside Nazi soldiers.
The soldiers fate went unknown for decades and he is listed on the Walls of the Missing at the Normandy American Cemetery in Colleville-sur-Mer, France.
A genealogist touring a German military cemetery noticed Baskind's name on a plaque under three crosses and contacted Operation Benjamin, an organization that works to identify Jewish American soldiers buried under incorrect religious markers.
The German War Grave Commission - the Volksbund - reported locating one of Baskind's identification tags and portions of American military clothing, but failed to identify his remains.
'Knowing that he's been buried in a German cemetery, so far from home and under a cross is a jagged scar for my family,' Samantha told The Post.
event_breakdown:
Identity of American WWII soldier missing for 80 years revealed - Remains of Jewish WWII solider Baskind returned to US 
The remains of a Jewish American World War II soldier Baskind have been brought back to the US 80 years after he went missing and were discovered in 2004 in an unknown grave in [[Germany]], [[War Grave Cemetery]]. The soldiers family, however, had to wait for German and US authorities to identify his remains and confirm he was buried with military honors.

message:

Marwan Naamani/dpaOne person died in a series of Israeli air strikes in Lebanon overnight, state media in the Middle Eastern country reported on Saturday.
A number of people were also injured in the attacks on various locations in southern Lebanon, according to the NNA news agency.
The military said it launched attacks during the night on Hezbollah targets around Aadloun, Qana and Hmaileh, among other locations, in response to earlier attacks targeting northern Israel.

title: Video shows Ukrainian drone taking out a jet ski with 2 Russian soldiers who were attempting to cross the Dnipro River
message:
Video shows Ukrainian drone taking out a jet ski with 2 Russian soldiers who were attempting to cross the Dnipro RiverDrones targeted Russian soldiers crossing the Dnipro River on a jet ski, said Ukraine.
Footage shared by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine appears to show Russian soldiers crossing the Dnipro River on a jet ski being taken out by a drone.
The video, released by Ukraine's 79th State Border Guard Service, appears to show the Russian soldiers being targeted by Ukrainian FPV drones.
The drone tracks the jet ski as it crosses the river.
When the Russian soldiers reach the opposing bank, the drone hones in and hits the jet ski.
event_breakdown: Ukraine says its forces destroyed a Russian Serna-class landing craft. The Ukrainian Center for Strategic Communications and Information Security said on Twitter that the attack was carried out in the Black Sea. The tweet included a photo of a burning vessel that appears to be similar in design to a Serna class.

title: Exact times Red Arrows fly over Worcestershire on Sunday
message:
The RAF's Red Arrows will fly through the county on their way to the Midlands Air Festival for the third and last time this week.
According to military-airshows.co.uk, the Red Arrows will be flying over Seven Stoke, Rowney Green, Redditch and Bretforton.

Midlands Air Festival takes place at Ragley Hall in Alcester, Warwickshire, from Friday to Sunday (May 31 to June 2).
Moreover, visitors will have the opportunity to witness one of the UK's largest gatherings of hot air balloons, including character designs and over 150 round hot air balloons.
